activities: The Robbins Company will receive employee data for their participation in company sponsored recognition programs.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer's employee data to include employee name, work address, work email (if provided), home address/phone/email (if provided) and other identfiable information required by the customer to support each program.
recoursemech: Commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union (EU DPAs), and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) or their authorized representatives.
